justification: Asks injury-averse Team B to trade a Tier 1 RB for a Tier 5 RB plus an injured, volatile WR—misaligned with B’s conservative, consensus-driven preferences. The rationale mislabels Matt Wright (a deep-threat Tier 5) as a consistency upgrade. Little evidence of considering B’s needs or incentives; focuses on A’s RB upgrade. Internally inconsistent with A’s floor preference by adding a low-floor WR. Acceptance probability is overstated.
